description: Detects handle requests and access operations to specific registry keys to calculate the SysKey Author: Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: SysKey Registry Keys Access
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:("4656" OR "4663") AND winlog.event_data.ObjectType:"key" AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:(*lsa\\JD OR *lsa\\GBG OR *lsa\\Skew1 OR *lsa\\Data))
